mapper.select: select t1.CHANNEL_ID as CHANNEL_ID, t1.PIPLE_ID as PIPLE_ID, t1.NOTIFY_URL as NOTIFY_URL, t1.VOLT as VOLT, t1.PRODUCTS as PRODUCTS from t_channel_piple t1 where t1.PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_channel_piple
CHANNEL_ID,
PIPLE_ID,
NOTIFY_URL,
VOLT,
#{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{notifyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{volt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
